item.description:
Hi to All!

For July, the bankruptcy attorney I had hoped to schedule for our meeting will be on vacation. I had hoped she could teach us about recent changes in the law, who can file, how it works. I know I have some clients for whom a bankruptcy filing can be a helpful strategy in avoiding a foreclosure.

At this time I do not have a speaker for us. But based on past experience, there are many members of the club who can offer insights on investing, financing, landlording, market trends. I will prepare some updated information on the real estate market now that we have gone through our Spring surge (?) to share.

Come ready to talk about your RE investment interests and experiences. Any newbies, come with questions. Either someone there will have answers, or we will find answers for you!

Set the day aside- July 7, 7-9PM. And see you there.
item.how_to_find_us: Come in and go down the stairs to our meeting room on the lower level.
item.why: Experienced investors and newbies. We all can learn from one another.
item.name: The Greater Boston Real Estate Investing Club July Meeting
